argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppcyon.o | |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 2 |  | oppcyon.y | |- Y = ( Yon ` O ) |
| 3 |  | oppcyon.m | |- M = ( HomF ` C ) |
| 4 |  | oppcyon.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_2oppchomf | |- ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_2oppccomf | |- ( comf ` C ) = ( comf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( comf ` C ) = ( comf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_oppccat | |- ( C e. Cat -> O e. Cat ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> O e. Cat ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppCat ` O ) = ( oppCat ` O ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oppccat | |- ( O e. Cat -> ( oppCat ` O ) e. Cat ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( oppCat ` O ) e. Cat ) |
| 14 | 6, 8, 4, 13 | #P_hofpropd | |- ( ph -> ( HomF ` C ) = ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) |
| 15 | 3, 14 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> M = ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( <. O , ( oppCat ` O ) >. curryF M ) = ( <. O , ( oppCat ` O ) >. curryF ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` O ) = ( Homf ` O ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( comf ` O ) = ( comf ` O ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( SetCat ` ran ( Homf ` C ) ) = ( SetCat ` ran ( Homf ` C ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Homf ` C ) e. _V |
| 21 | 20 | #P_rnex | |- ran ( Homf ` C ) e. _V |
| 22 | 21 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ran ( Homf ` C ) e. _V ) |
| 23 |  | #P_ssid | |- ran ( Homf ` C ) C_ ran ( Homf ` C ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ran ( Homf ` C ) C_ ran ( Homf ` C ) ) |
| 25 | 3, 1, 19, 4, 22, 24 | #P_hofcl | |- ( ph -> M e. ( ( O Xc. C ) Func ( SetCat ` ran ( Homf ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 26 | 17, 18, 6, 8, 10, 10, 4, 13, 25 | #P_curfpropd | |- ( ph -> ( <. O , C >. curryF M ) = ( <. O , ( oppCat ` O ) >. curryF M ) ) |
| 27 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) = ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) |
| 28 | 2, 10, 11, 27 | #P_yonval | |- ( ph -> Y = ( <. O , ( oppCat ` O ) >. curryF ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) ) ) |
| 29 | 16, 26, 28 | #P_3eqtr4rd | |- ( ph -> Y = ( <. O , C >. curryF M ) ) |
